select r.*,u.uname from sys_authentication_record r LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = r.user where 1=1 <#if updateUserId?exists && updateUserId!=""> AND r.update_user_id= :updateUserId </#if> <#if user?exists && user!=""> AND u.uname like concat('%',:uname,'%') </#if> <#if status?exists && status!=""> AND r.status =:status </#if>
